New Records: Bobby Witt Jr. became the first player in Royals history with consecutive 30-home run seasons
Key Match Events: Yordan Alvarez hit a home run to right in the fourth inning
Jon Singleton hit a two-run homer to right to give Houston a 3-0 lead
Bobby Witt Jr. hit his 30th home run of the season in the seventh inning
Pre-Game Insights: The Royals were tied with Cleveland for the American League Central lead before the game
Post-Match Reflections: Royals manager Matt Quatraro said the whole series was frustrating and that they didn't come out of it with any wins
Alec Marsh said they need to flush the series and move on to the next game
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Royals were swept in a four-game series for the first time since 2021
Kansas City fell 3 1/2 games behind the Guardians in the AL Central
